To capture photos and video, allow unfacd access to the camera. unfacd needs the Camera permission to take photos or video, but it has been permanently denied. Group name is now \'%1$s\'. Share your profile with members of this group? Unlock unfacd requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations. To send media and group messages, tap \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once. Only current conversation partner will see your profile. Sharing your profile with this group will automatically forward your profile to current and future members. Un-sharing your profile will remove it from current members of this group. For others, you\'ll have to un-share manually. Sharing your profile with this user will make available to them some of your private information such as your avatar and nickname. Un-sharing your profile will prevent others from seeing some of your private information such as your avatar and nickname. Enable message read confirmation Enabling message read confirmation will let user know if you\'ve read their messages. User is currently notified every time you read their messages. Ignore message read confirmation Stop receiving read confirmation for your messages from this user? User is notifying you every time they read your messages. Changed Rejected Enable Disable Enable GeoGroups Roaming Disable GeoGroups Roaming GeoGroups Roaming requires access to your location. With GeoGroups Roaming disabled your location won\'t be used to automatically connect you with local groups. Wanderer mode Automatically join GeoGroups in your neighbourhood as your physical location changes. Additionally, you\'ll automatically leave the most recent GeoGroup joined, unless it is marked as \'sticky\'. Conqueror mode Automatically join GeoGroups in your neighbourhood as your physical location changes, retaining all earlier ones as well. Journaler mode Automatically receive join invitations to GeoGroups in your neighbourhood as your physical location changes. GeoLoc Roaming Trigger Neighbourhood Major regions Countries User Groups settings Base Location Zone Neighbourhood regions Countries Selfzone unfacd Network You\'ll remain in this group regardless of changes in your location. If you enabled Wanderer Mode for GeGroups you\'ll be automatically removed from this group if your geo location changed. unfacd needs access to your location to turn on GeoGroups and to allow discovery of local groups and events. To help you memorize your Registration Lock PIN, unfacd will periodically ask you to confirm it. I forgot my PIN. Forgotten PIN? Registration Lock helps protect your phone number from unauthorized registration attempts. This feature can be disabled at any time in your unfacd privacy settings Registration Lock Enable The Registration Lock PIN must be at least 4 digits. The two PINs you entered do not match. so you can discover more. unfacd encrypts all messages on the
public network. unfacd will notify you when your messages
are delivered and read by receipients. unfacd features some of the strongest group
management controls available. unfacd contains no hidden behaviours
and code is peer-reviewed. unfacd features strong privacy controls:
you control what other know about you. Start now! // You haven\'t received any invitations. Groups you left will be displayed here. Your nickname successfully changed...
